notificationsSectionDescription: How would you like to receive communications from the Automation Hub regarding new automations or app changes?
environmentSectionDescription: Every automation you create operates within your exclusive personal environment on the Microsoft Power Platform, ensuring a tailored and efficient experience.
personalDevEnvLearMoreUrlTitle: Learn how to create an environment
invalidGuidErrorMessage: The Environment ID is not a valid GUID
personalDevEnvIdInvalidErrorMessage: Please enter a valid personal environment ID
pdeSaveConfirmationDialogMessage: Are you sure you want to change your selected personal environment? Changing the environment will not move previously installed automations.
pdeDialogMessage: Kindly proceed to <0>Power Platform Admin Center (aka.ms/ppac)</0> to initiate the setup of your new developer environment. After establishing the environment, please ensure to copy the environment ID and insert it into the designated input field.
pdeCreationInstructionsMessage: For comprehensive guidance on setting up your Personal Developer Environment, please refer to the <0>FAQs Page</0>.
